amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1.8 million from the Bureau of Land Management to the Fish and Wildlife Service for construction of the Bear River Migratory Bird Refuge Education Center in Utah.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the amount appropriated for Land Acquisition by $1,800,000 and to increase the account for Construction by $1,800,000 by transfer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
